## Checklist:

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules

## Security Checklist:

- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, etc.) is exposed in the code
- [ ] All user inputs are properly validated and sanitized
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No XSS vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Authentication and authorization checks are in place where needed
- [ ] No console.log statements left in production code
- [ ] Environment variables are used for all configuration
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Rate limiting is implemented for API endpoints (if applicable)
- [ ] CORS is properly configured (if applicable)
